description: Hypnos has the ability to completely cut off power for peripherals while keeping the feather awake to run deep sleep code. More than just a powerboard, the Hypnos board comes with high precision real-time clock DS3231 and a microSD card for logging data during operation.
title: OPEnSLab-OSU/OPEnS-Hypnos: V3.1
